row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PRV.JOB.REMOVE_ADHOST
row.description: suppression du serveur dans l'Active Directory

row.process:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.EXECUTION_ENVIRONMENT
!-------------------------------------Logging input parameters------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_CONNECTION_DETAILS
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
!DECRYPT PASSWORD ! : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH ! : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_VSP_PASSWORD#" ! : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD
!------------------------------------ Powershell script for the action -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
! $Computer = '&VM_NAME_NEW#' ! $NewOU = '&DEST_AD#' write-host "Remove-ADComputer -Identity &VM_NAME_NEW#" !Get-ADComputer $Computer | Move-ADObject -TargetPath "$NewOU" ! Get-ADComputer -filter {name -eq "&VM_NAME_NEW#"} -SearchBase "DC=D20,DC=tes,DC=local" -server "d20.tes.local" |Move-ADObject -TargetPath "&DEST_AD#" Remove-ADComputer -Identity &VM_NAME_NEW# -Confirm:$false
!-----------------------------------Error Handling------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- !Status messages :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** REMOVE AD OBJECT EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "********REMOVE AD OBJECT ACTION FAILED ********"
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_ERRORSTATUS
